typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		active as string,
		description as string,
		pk_source_system as string,
		last_updated_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_source_system.parquet']) ~> PreDimSourceSystem
source(output(
		sou_key as string,
		sou_description as string,
		top_key as string,
		top_description as string,
		dim_key as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['dim/m_dim_source_system.parquet']) ~> DimSourceSystemInput
RemoveUnusedColumns derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Source Systems') ~> DeriveTopLevel
DimSourceSystemInput aggregate(maxDimKey = max(dim_key)) ~> maxDimKey
DimSourceSystemInput select(mapColumn(
		sou_key,
		dim_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBusinessKey
PreDimSourceSystem select(mapColumn(
		pk_source_system,
		description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnusedColumns
DeriveTopLevel sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['m_dim_source_system.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimSourceSystemUpdate
